HOME.TITLE: Cohor - Meet your new social crew
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Create or join a group, match with others, and start chatting — together.

HERO.TITLE: Meet your new social crew Match-Chat-Connect
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Create or join a group, match with others, and start chatting — together.

FEATURES.TITLE: Explore. Match. Connect with Groups.
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Discover real-time group chat, privacy-focused spaces, and the easiest way to meet new friend groups online.

FEATURE_1.TITLE: Create or Join Groups
FEATURE_1.DESCRIPTION: Start a new group or join one in seconds. Easily connect with your friends — or bring them along!

FEATURE_2.TITLE: Discover New Groups
FEATURE_2.DESCRIPTION: Find and match with other groups. Make friends and expand your social circle, together.

FEATURE_3.TITLE: Privacy & Security First
FEATURE_3.DESCRIPTION: Your group stays safe. All chats are private, secure, and built with protection at the core.

FEATURE_4.TITLE: Real-time Group Chat
FEATURE_4.DESCRIPTION: Experience seamless group conversations. Chat with all members at once, instantly and effortlessly.

QUOTE.CONTENT: “Cohor helps you build genuine connections, where groups grow and friendships thrive. It’s about connecting people who truly belong together, effortlessly.”
QUOTE.TITLE: Founder & CEO of Cohor

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Cohor is designed to simplify the way you connect with others, helping you find, join, and grow groups effortlessly — so you can focus on building meaningful relationships.

CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Email successfully confirmed!
CONFIRMATION.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for verifying your account. You can now start connecting with other groups on Cohor.
CONFIRMATION.REGARDS: See you inside, The Cohor Team
CONFIRMATION.NOT_REDIRECTION: If you are not redirected automatically in a few seconds,
